name: Mountains for loneliness times
description:
I had left my girlfriend more than 10k km away. I went to travel Italy.
I was a lonely man. 
Happiness for me was to go on with my travels 
but I will never forget 
I've been looking at that mountain thinking about her,
many times.

I thought, maybe lovers have to be like birds:
fly nearly and freely.

After that, I felt growing up.
I said to myself: never leave a girlfriend again because of traveling.

Mountains are so unique and big for humans. 
We find meaning to them.
That one is today a memory of someone missing for me.
